sentence: View host/CNN commentator Ana Navarro attended, as well as North Carolina Congressman Madison Cawthorn.
author: Abram Brown
title: Poolside Fundraisers, Crypto And Mini-Trumps: Inside Peter Thiel's Life After Facebook

sentence: Almost everyone had expected Moore to run in the 13th District under the map that has since been struck down, but he decided not to after Rep. Madison Cawthorn surprised everyone by announcing he'd run for that constituency rather than the neighboring 14th.
title: Morning Digest: Longtime Democratic power player on Long Island will not seek

sentence: EXCLUSIVE Rep. Madison Cawthorn may have violated federal insider trading laws as he hyped up an alleged pump-and-dump cryptocurrency scheme, multiple watchdog groups told the Washington Examiner.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Madison Cawthorn implicated in potential insider trading scheme, experts say

sentence: Erin Siegal | Reuters A Republican senator on Wednesday called on Congress to investigate his GOP colleague Rep. Madison Cawthorn, of North Carolina, who has come under fire as ethics watchdogs raise suspicions of possible insider trading over his relationship to an anti-Biden cryptocurrency.
author: Kevin Breuninger
title: Fellow North Carolina Republican calls for insider trading probe of Rep. Madison Cawthorn's crypto holdings

sentence: Topline Sen. Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading schemethe latest in a series of scandals for Cawthorn.
author: Anna Kaplan
title: Sen. Tillis Calls For Insider Trading Probe Over Rep. Cawthorn's Ties To Let's Go Brandon' Meme Coin

sentence: Speculation that the Republican Party may be trying to purge Representative Madison Cawthorn from Congress has intensified after the North Carolina congressman was embroiled in yet another potential scandal.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Is Madison Cawthorn Being Purged by Republicans?

sentence: Just In... Sen. Thom Tillis called on the House Ethics Committee to investigate allegations that his fellow North Carolina Republican, Rep. Madison Cawthorn, engaged in an insider trading scheme.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Thom Tillis calls for investigation into Madison Cawthorn insider trading allegations

sentence: Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn simply cannot keep it together right now.
author: Paul Blest
title: Madison Cawthorn Is Having a Hell of a Week

sentence: The leader of the "Let's Go Brandon" cryptocurrency revealed that Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-NC) traded the meme coin three weeks before NASCAR driver Brandon Brown announced he had struck a sponsorship deal with the coin, heightening suspicion from watchdogs that the beleaguered congressman may have violated insider trading laws.
author: Andrew Kerr
title: Meme coin leader's admission could land Madison Cawthorn in more hot water
